title: Project-Based Learning Design in Social Sciences Utilizing Online Feedback Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social sciences and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners solve real-world social problems through projects, with asynchronous collaboration and feedback exchange via digital devices. Learning outcomes are measured through summative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more specific improvement plans to enhance the quality of project deliverables using an online feedback system
Learners can write five or more feedbacks including systematic analysis and constructive suggestions as feedback providers for peers' projects
Learners can identify and propose two or more improvement points for feedback systems according to Design-Based Implementation Research (DBIR) principles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
